title: Emily's Case of Depression
clinical_history: Emily is a 32-year-old marketing executive who has been experiencing symptoms of depression over the past 6 months. She reports feeling persistently sad, empty, and hopeless, with a significant loss of interest in activities she once enjoyed. She has also experienced changes in appetite and sleep patterns, with increased fatigue and difficulty concentrating at work.

nprs.affected_area: constant feeling of sadness and hopelessness

aggrevating_factors: social interactions, work-related stress, lack of motivation
picture: a person with a downtrodden expression
easing_factors: engaging in creative activities, spending time with loved ones, exercise
past_history: history of anxiety in childhood, family history of depression
medical_history: generally healthy, but has experienced some chronic pain in her lower back
medications: currently taking sertraline, previously tried fluoxetine
personal_history: married with a young child, has a strained relationship with her partner, feels overwhelmed with responsibilities
